SELECT a.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY no DESC) AS orderNo FROM ( SELECT count(title) OVER(PARTITION BY 1) count, no, title, content, category, tag, signdate, userID, u.blog_nickname userNickName FROM blog_post b, user u
where userID=#{userID}
and category = #{category}
and tag like '%${tag}%'
and (title like '%${search}%' or content like '%${search}%')
and no = ${no}
and useYN ='Y'
where category like '%${category}%' or tag like '%${category}%' and useYN ='Y'
where title like '%${search}%' or content like '%${search}%' and useYN ='Y'
where category like '%${search}%' or tag like '%${search}%' and useYN ='Y'
where userID like '%${search}%' or userNickName like '%${search}%' and useYN ='Y'
where useYN ='Y'
and b.userID = u.id order by no desc ) a
limit ${start},5
limit ${start},${block}
mapper.insert: insert into blog_post(title, content, category, tag, signdate, userID, userNickName) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{tag}, NOW(), #{userID}, #{userNickName})
mapper.update: update blog_post set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, category=#{category}, tag=#{tag}, updatedate=NOW() where no=#{no}
mapper.delete: update blog_post set useYN ='N' where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select category_name, count from blog_category where userID = #{userID} and useYN = "Y" order by category_order_no, no
